meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fiendish
meanings.sent1: Her fiendishnesses were evident in the way she plotted against her friends.
meanings.sent2: The fiendishnesses of the villain were revealed in his cruel actions.
meanings.sent3: Despite his fiendishnesses, he still had a charming smile.
meanings.sent4: The fiendishnesses lurking within him emerged when he was betrayed.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of her fiendishnesses cast a shadow over the town.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors characteristic of a fiend
meanings.sent1: The fiendishnesses of the criminal were evident in his sinister deeds.
meanings.sent2: The fiendishnesses of the monster terrified the villagers.
meanings.sent3: His fiendishnesses made him the perfect villain in the story.
meanings.sent4: The fiendishnesses of the ghostly figure sent shivers down their spines.
meanings.sent5: The fiendishnesses of the witch were unmatched in the realm.

meanings.definition: The presence of evil or malicious intent
meanings.sent1: The fiendishnesses in his eyes revealed his true nature.
meanings.sent2: The fiendishnesses behind her smile sent a chill down his spine.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful fiendishnesses kept the dog on its toes.
meanings.sent4: The fiendishnesses of the storm seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent5: The fiendishnesses of the shadows danced in the moonlight.
